technical_risks.description: Qwen API providers (Alibaba Cloud, ModelScope, OpenRouter) may have different reliability profiles compared to Anthropic's Claude API
mitigation_strategies: Set up comprehensive monitoring and alerting

technical_risks.description: Qwen models may not perform as well as Claude for specific pAI tasks like email summarization and content generation
mitigation_strategies: Maintain Claude Code as backup option

technical_risks.description: Qwen Code action may require significant modifications to work seamlessly with pAI's FastAgent and MCP server architecture
mitigation_strategies: Plan for custom action development time

technical_risks.description: Adding Qwen Code introduces new dependencies and potential conflicts with existing toolchain
mitigation_strategies: Document all dependencies and version requirements

operational_risks.description: Custom Qwen Code integration may require more ongoing maintenance compared to using Claude Code directly
mitigation_strategies: Contribute improvements back to upstream project
Plan for regular updates and patches

operational_risks.description: Unexpected usage patterns or pricing changes could lead to higher costs than anticipated
mitigation_strategies: Set up billing alerts and limits
Regularly review and optimize usage patterns

operational_risks.description: Migration from Claude Code to Qwen Code could temporarily disrupt existing pAI agent workflows
Existing monitoring and alerting may not cover Qwen Code specific failure modes and performance characteristics
mitigation_strategies: Extend monitoring to cover Qwen Code metrics
Set up alerts for API failures and performance issues
Implement health checks and status dashboards
Plan for log aggregation and analysis

security_risks.description: Qwen Code may process sensitive data through different providers with varying privacy policies compared to Anthropic
mitigation_strategies: Review and compare privacy policies of all providers
Implement data classification and handling procedures
Consider on-premises or private cloud deployment
Audit data flows and storage practices

security_risks.description: Qwen Code introduces new supply chain dependencies that could be compromised
mitigation_strategies: Pin dependency versions and verify integrity

security_risks.description: Additional API keys and credentials need to be securely managed for Qwen providers

strategic_risks.description: Heavy investment in Qwen Code customizations could create dependency on specific provider ecosystem
mitigation_strategies: Design abstraction layers for AI provider switching

strategic_risks.description: Rapid AI/ML evolution could make Qwen Code or chosen providers obsolete
mitigation_strategies: Stay informed about AI/ML technology trends
Design flexible architecture for technology swapping
Participate in relevant communities and standards

strategic_risks.description: Qwen Code integration project may consume resources that could be better used elsewhere
mitigation_strategies: Set clear success metrics and timelines
Plan for incremental implementation and validation
Regularly reassess project value and priorities
